Positive Role Model - Text 2

From graduate or current student perspective

Be sure to ask plenty of questions so that you know whatâ€™s required - the more questions that are asked the more information you will gather. That is what helped me get through the first year and into my second.

Mary (Student)

One piece of advice I would give, based on what helped me get good marks in my first year, set aside time for reading and take good notes as you go. I found myself reading loads and then having to read again if I had not taken notes - good time wasted! The content is interesting, but you need to revise as you go.

John (Student)
